name: tinyfish-io__agentql-mcp
description: Model Context Protocol server that integrates AgentQL's data extraction capabilities.

api_key.title: AgentQL API Key
api_key.description: Your API key from the AgentQL Dev Portal.

raw_dependencies:
=== package.json ===
{
  "name": "agentql-mcp",
  "version": "1.0.0",
  "description": "Model Context Protocol (MCP) server that integrates AgentQL data extraction capabilities.",
  "license": "MIT",
  "repository": "https://github.com/tinyfish-io/agentql-mcp.git",
  "type": "module",
  "bin": {
    "agentql-mcp": "./dist/index.js"
  },
  "files": [
    "dist"
  ],
  "scripts": {
    "build": "tsc && node -e \"require('fs').chmodSync('dist/index.js', '755')\"",
    "prepare": "npm run build",
    "watch": "tsc --watch",
    "inspector": "npx @modelcontextprotocol/inspector dist/index.js",
    "lint": "eslint src",
    "lint:fix": "npm run lint -- --fix",
    "format": "prettier --write src"
  },
  "dependencies": {
    "@modelcontextprotocol/sdk": "1.6.1",
    "node-fetch": "^3.3.2"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "@trivago/prettier-plugin-sort-imports": "^4.3.0",
    "@types/node": "^20.11.24",
    "@types/node-fetch": "^2.6.12",
    "@typescript-eslint/eslint-plugin": "^8.4.0",
    "eslint": "^8.57.0",
    "eslint-config-prettier": "^9.1.0",
    "prettier": "^3.4.2",
    "typescript": "^5.3.3"
  },
  "keywords": [
    "mcp",
    "agentql",
    "data-extraction",
    "web-scraping",
    "content-extraction"
  ]
}
